  • Constructor Details

    • SimpleGame

      @Deprecated public SimpleGame(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> selectedColors, List<String> nicknames) throws IncorrectPlayersException
      Deprecated.
      view-less constructor Creates a new SimpleGame with the parameters chosen by the players, must be initialized after creation via the initializeGame() function
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players in the game [2,4]
      selectedWizards - array containing users' selection for their wizards
      selectedColors - array containing users' selection for their tower colors
      nicknames - array containing users' nicknames
      Throws:
      IncorrectPlayersException - the number of players isn't in the allowed range

    • SimpleGame

      public SimpleGame(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> selectedColors, List<String> nicknames, VirtualView virtualView) throws IncorrectPlayersException
      Observer pattern version Creates a new SimpleGame with the parameters chosen by the players, must be initialized after creation via the initializeGame() function
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players in the game [2,4]
      selectedWizards - array containing users' selection for their wizards
      selectedColors - array containing users' selection for their tower colors
      nicknames - array containing users' nicknames
      virtualView - the view that will hold the watchers for the model classes
      Throws:
      IncorrectPlayersException - the number of players isn't in the allowed range

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes the current game, mimics the setting up of the board

    • createPlayingSack

      protected void createPlayingSack()
      Creates the Sack that will be used during the game and assigns it to this game's sack. Can be overridden

      Creates the island groups of this game and assigns them to this.islandGroups. Can be overridden

    • createParameters

      protected void createParameters()
      This method initializes the parameters of the game This is meant to be overridden in the advancedIslandGroup class to build both types of parameters

    • createPlayers

      @Deprecated protected void createPlayers(int numPlayers)
      Deprecated.
      !This method doesn't allow for customization from the users! This method initializes the players held in the game it can be overridden to account for the creation of AdvancedPlayers in advanced games
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players to create

    • createPlayers

      @Deprecated protected void createPlayers(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> selectedColors, List<String> nicknames)
      Deprecated.
      Creates players based on the parameters received by the users (wizard, tower color and usernames selected)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players to create
      selectedWizards - array containing the correspondence between player and selected wizard
      selectedColors - array containing the correspondence between player and selected tower color
      nicknames - array containing the users' nicknames

    • createPlayers

      protected void createPlayers(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> selectedColors, List<String> nicknames, VirtualView virtualView)
      Creates players based on the parameters received by the users (wizard, tower color and usernames selected)
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players to create
      selectedWizards - array containing the correspondence between player and selected wizard
      selectedColors - array containing the correspondence between player and selected tower color
      nicknames - array containing the users' nicknames
      virtualView - the virtual view to update after a model change

      Parameters:
      professor - the professor who needs to checked for updates

    • playerWithMoreStudent

      public PlayerEnum playerWithMoreStudent(StudentEnum studentColor)
      Parameters:
      studentColor - != NO_STUDENT && != null
      Returns:
      the player's PlayerEnum with more students at table with chosen studentColor. If nobody has more students than other players return NoPlayer

    • moveMN

      public int moveMN(int steps)
      move Mother Nature across island groups. Update the currentPositionMN in parameters.
      Parameters:
      steps - >= 0
      Returns:
      id of islandGroup where MN has been placed

    • evaluateIsland

      public void evaluateIsland(int idIsland) throws UnmergeableException
      Evaluate the influence on chosen island group. Get winnerTeam by chosen island group's evaluate method, then call build method and if winnerTeam is different from No team it builds towers on chosen island group, then call mergeAdjacent and create a new islandGroup with island merged. Set Mother Nature on new island group and update parameters. If no merge is possible throws exception.
      Parameters:
      idIsland - != null
      Throws:
      UnmergeableException - when there are no island to merge

    • toBean

      public GameElementBean toBean()
      Specified by:
      toBean in class DrawableObject
      Returns:
      a java Bean with all general information about this game, a list with island groups id, a list of played assistants, a list of players id, the current player id, current turn number, current phase

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(Player player, int id)
      Play assistant card updating model with right playedAssistant
      Parameters:
      player - != null
      id - (1 <= id <= 10)

    • playedAssistants

      public List<Assistant> playedAssistants()
      Returns:

      public void sortIslandGroups()
      This method sort the islandGroups list. In this way islandGroups[0] will be the previous node group pointed by islandGroups[1] ecc...
